characters: Driver of a white sedan, driver of a white SUV, motorcyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a city road approaching an intersection. A white sedan is seen on the left side, and a white SUV is ahead in the same lane. A motorcyclist is approaching from the left side. The white sedan suddenly cuts into the lane of the self-driving vehicle, causing a potential collision risk.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed while approaching the intersection. The white SUV ahead is slowing down, and the white sedan on the left side suddenly cuts into the lane, forcing the self-driving vehicle to decelerate to avoid a collision.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A white sedan, approximately 5 meters away, suddenly cuts into the self-driving vehicles lane. 2) Front: A white SUV, approximately 10 meters away, slowing down. 3) Left side: A motorcyclist, approximately 15 meters away, approaching the intersection.
